message: Let's make a deal Bob. I take $60, you take $40. It's a good deal for you in the first round!
I'll take $55 and you take $45. It's a better deal than the last one, considering inflation, you should take it!
Okay Bob, let's be reasonable. I'll take $55, you take $45.  The inflation is hurting us both, let's settle this now.
Considering the inflation, my last offer was generous. Now I'll take $60 and you take $40. You're losing more value each round, it's time to accept!
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Let's split it evenly, 50/50. It's the fairest deal and we're both losing money by being stubborn!

Alice, you're right that we're both losing money, but I'm willing to make a compromise. I'll take $57 and you take $43. This is a better deal for you than my last offer, considering the inflation. Don't let your share lose even more value, accept this offer!
Bob, I'm compromising again. You get slightly more, let's end this before inflation eats up all the profit!

Alice, you're right that inflation is eating up the profit, but I'm willing to take on that risk to get a better deal. I'll take $65 and you take $35. Considering the massive loss you're taking due to inflation, this is still a relatively good deal for you. Don't risk losing even more, accept this offer!
Bob, this is ridiculous!  I'm taking a hit here but we need to settle this NOW.  $45 to me, $55 to you.  Take it or leave it - we're running out of time!
